name: The Fabric of the Mind - DEMO
name_original: The Fabric of the Mind - DEMO
description:
This is the DEMO of "The Fabric of the Mind". 

The goal of this game is to find out what your purpose in the world you stubled into is.

Everything is in Black and White. Has it always been like this, or does it have something to do with your arrival?

Here's the link to a feedback form. Filling this out will help me to make the full release the best it can be. Thanks =): https://forms.gle/8bnaXLD5zwrsGERd8

If you would like to follow the development of this game, I regularly post devlogs about this game on my YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7hN93enhLrD0NuMh8f47VA
